attributes.title: Never
attributes.review: Take up to much space doesn’t make since took daysss to download and it leave viruses in you phone

attributes.title: Terrible Immersion
attributes.review: I came to this wanting to be immersed in my current dystopian novel, however, it stole all of its material from real dystopias. I can understand taking inspiration, but this crosses a line!

attributes.title: Do not download!!!!!!
attributes.review: This app is not ok. I am not a trump supporter what so ever. I’m just here to leave a bad review so that way I can say I’ve done something and so I know I’ve made my mark somewhere.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!! 😡🤬
attributes.review: I DO NOT suggest this app it takes 38 hrs to download and once i opened the app it completely crashed my iPhone it is currently getting repaired right now I’m writing this review on my leapfrog.

attributes.title: This is a horrible app.
attributes.review: I’m just going to start out with of I could give this app a zero star rating I would. It is absolutely the stinkiest app ever! 0 out of 5 😒

attributes.title: garbage
attributes.review: this app took over a month to download, and now my phone runs really slow. the app made it able for russia to infiltrate my phone and share all of my personal information with rapists, racists, homophobes, and misogynists(at least one). it runs poorly, isn’t user friendly, and helps to keep systematic oppression in place.

attributes.title: A very confusing app
attributes.review: This app is just about a landfill I did not get any useful information about the waste management system

attributes.title: Just don’t download it
attributes.review: It never work great for me. It always took forever to load. And it wasted a lot of my battery for no reason

attributes.title: This is stupid
attributes.review: This app is so stupid I hate it with what I have left of a heart it needs to be taken down out president needs to quit we need Obama back as our president

attributes.title: literally horrible 🤢
attributes.review: who even uses this app???? it took decades to download and glitched the SECOND i opened it 🤬😞😤 when it FINALLY opened it showed Donald Trumps shrimp 🍤 as the loading screen. absolutely DISGUSTING 😱
